definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Do you see some sort of litmus test?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲有某種類似石蕊試紙的東西可以幫助判斷嗎？

sentences.english: Rather, the principle is a litmus test.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，原則就像一個石蕊試紙試驗。
